dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S470 IS: Respect State Housing Laws Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Hyde-Smith (for herself and Mr. Hagerty) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the CARES Act to remove a requirement on lessors to provide notice to vacate, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Respect State Housing Laws Act.
Section 4024 of the CARES Act (15 U.S.C. 9058) is amended by striking subsection (c).
